website_summaries.verdict: A great middle-of-the-road amplifier option for people wanting a small boost in audio performance.
pros: Two-channel input capability is geared toward vehicles with two speaker systems
Total max power of 1,000 watts provides a noticeable boost in volume and dynamics

customer_reviews.title: it doesn’t seem like my (2) 8” subs are even working
customer_reviews.text: For being 500W, it doesn’t seem like my (2) 8” subs are even working. When I turn the speaker level up to the max and crank up the volume, then it is present. Sending back
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Second one of these I own
customer_reviews.text: If you need a simple 2-channel, very powerful for the size amp, this is it. Always liked Pioneer, this amp is up with their best. Simple to wire and use, low and high inputs, gain control and low-pass switch - nothing fancy, just cohjones when needed. I love both of mine - one runs 2 10" bass drivers in my truck, one runs 2 6-ft cabs with dual 18-inch drivers out back just fine.
customer_reviews.author: TheTimeRider

customer_reviews.title: Great starter amp.
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price. Don’t have to worry about my son blowing this amp up like he did mine. Great starter for a young hard headed son. LOL. JK, he’s a good boy.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Miller

customer_reviews.title: Such a great little amp.
customer_reviews.text: Loud, powerful, affordable, compact. this little thing ticked all the boxes for a sub install in my wife's Jeep Liberty. It is mounted neatly, and nearly invisible, under the rear slider seat on the driver's side. It is incredibly powerful and can be heard literally blocks away at half volume.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: not designed to push a sub!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this little guy to power a 12" pioneer sub. It gets it done but only briefly. 10 minutes of pounding before it cuts out and will burn your fingers! Its not designed to go- hard for a woofer. Probably is better fkr 6x9 or 6".
customer_reviews.author: colerless295ð   ð   ð  ©

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: Works and looks great to power my 10 inch sub
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline S.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t bother.
customer_reviews.text: Piece of garbage. Used less than three months on some shallow mount JBL 10s. Very light light use. Now it’s cutting out and is just straight junk. Hooked up an older amp to try my connections with no issues, hooked this thing back up and nothing, cutting in and out again. Do yourself a favor Get a better amp. I have a nice piece of red and black of garbage now that I can’t return.
customer_reviews.author: JHARRISON1985

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and works better than you'd think
customer_reviews.text: It works really well. And leaves no room for complaints, especially at it's price point. But it packed quit a bit of power. I'm running a 800watt rms speaker that peaks at 1000watt and it shakes the car quite a bit. I'd rem
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: I have a 10in Sub and ive had a little trouble with it but so far so good.
customer_reviews.text: It is an OK amp. I have a 10in Sub and ive had a little trouble with it but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fried my speaker and smoked out my car initially
customer_reviews.text: Hooked the amp up to a pre tested 8 each speaker, immediately started smoking and fried the speaker right after installation. Now it’s too late to return. Had to wait on availability for professional installation, now I’m out a speaker and amp. Definitely test the amp immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: Good amp for a small sub maybe. Amp doesn't have many options. Low pass filter only too. I returned mine
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Not a knockoff
customer_reviews.text: My son install this in his truck I here him come home every day
customer_reviews.author: Vincent Turner

customer_reviews.title: Good lil amp
customer_reviews.text: Installed this for my friend, for his box of tweeters. It does the trick
customer_reviews.author: The Mad Titan

customer_reviews.title: Get why you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Bought this amp last October. It has worked great on my Polaris Rangers roof powering 2 6.5 kickers, which I think is a perfect match. Until today when it randomly crapped out on me. Worked fine 12 hours ago now,nothing
customer_reviews.author: John Uzar

customer_reviews.title: It just died...
customer_reviews.text: Died after two weeks of light use. amazon is great and sending me a replacement. Hopefully this next one will last.
customer_reviews.author: Likes Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Too expensive
customer_reviews.text: I didn't get the sound of what I was expected.
customer_reviews.author: Hector rehectoromar

customer_reviews.title: The amp was easy to connect
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the 2 channel 500watt amp to replace the junk that came stock in my Porsche. The amp was easy to connect, adjust and looks great installed. Set it up to use with 2, 8" subs and it sounds great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: It’s small and doesn’t take much place and amazing sound quality
customer_reviews.author: koshkosh01

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: The amp keeps cutting off when i turn it up just a little cant turn it up because it turns off. I think it came defective but i cant returm it.
customer_reviews.author: Esoto

customer_reviews.title: Bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: This is a great budget friendly amp that you can use to power either a few speakers or some subs.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Archuleta

customer_reviews.title: Not 500 watts
customer_reviews.text: This 500 watt amp would not push one 12” sub. The barley does move at wide open.
customer_reviews.author: scott

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great with new pioneer head and 8” triax speakers
customer_reviews.author: mark sexton

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my daughters car. Hooked up to one subwoofer and it sounds great.
customer_reviews.author: bill

customer_reviews.title: Sounds off, works fine
customer_reviews.text: Works fine, sound is off no matter how much I mess with it
customer_reviews.author: Glen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amp works excellent I'm using a 2502 bridge mode and it hits pretty hard.
customer_reviews.author: Freddy

customer_reviews.title: Quality and Price
customer_reviews.text: for what its worth, my amp has worked like advertised, no problems thus far
customer_reviews.author: Jesus Alejandro Casillas de la Mora

customer_reviews.title: Gain lable backwards
customer_reviews.text: So it is a good amp for the money, it does work. The gain setting was lables backwards on mine to pay attention to that if you are having trouble tuning it with your system. I used it to drive 4 8" full range speakers. It gets loud and pretty clear but there are much better options out there is you want real quality. I only got this to hold me through a few months till i get some alpine amps. Realistically this amp may push around 150-200watts rms on its best settings. That still some really loud music and if you dont know a lot about audio this amp will impress.
customer_reviews.author: justin

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to my factory audio system
customer_reviews.text: Great little amp! I’ve had it for 3 years now and it’s still working great. I got this amp because I wanted something that will work with my stock stereo, and it delivered! I’m using it with a 12” pioneer subwoofer and it’s producing bass that I can feel. It works as if it was a beefed up factory amp.
customer_reviews.author: Fjr

customer_reviews.title: Great little amp!
customer_reviews.text: What can I say...? It's a pioneer. It's wonderful. It sounds good. It's cheap and it works flawlessly. Plus being a pioneer. I know I don't have to worry about failure anytime soon.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: This amp used as a subwoofer amp works AWESOME!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I replaced a factory sub and amp with Pioneer amp and this Thumps to the music I listen to. I am very happy with my purchase and would recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Piltzecker

customer_reviews.title: Don’t get it it’s a waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I used a lower watt amp and them put this one and had no difference in my old one. I feel like it’s not worth it. I say no
customer_reviews.author: Mo

customer_reviews.title: Best amp ever for my 10" subwoofer
customer_reviews.text: Great sound quality with my 10" Pioneer subwoofer. You can't beat the performance of this amp for a medium-sized subwoofer setup. I purchased this to replace my 15-year-old Pioneer 240W amp that finally died. I hope this one will last just as long. I tried a similar BOSS amp, but the volume and sound quality were very disappointing. Why mess with the perfect formula? I sold the BOSS and bought another Pioneer, and my stereo sounds better than ever.
customer_reviews.author: Stevie

customer_reviews.title: Great little amp for the price
customer_reviews.text: I used this amp to power a 10" Shallow Mount MB Quart Sub that we installed in my wife's 2004 Honda Pilot. For under $65 this little guy rocks.
customer_reviews.author: L. Boyer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT Sound
customer_reviews.text: I got it installed in my car and the music sounds so much better.
customer_reviews.author: Bella Royal

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Product worked perfectly powers my dual 10" enclosure just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Jaden

customer_reviews.title: 95w RMS!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Be careful with this as it is misleading. The RMS for this thing is 95 watts. It may be ok for a pair of 6x9s but don't even think about hooking these to a subwoofer. Unless you have something rated this low then don't bother with this unit. Always look for the RMS rating otherwise the 500w it claims will be too much in the long run and the amp will eventually quit. Other than that the unit is fine. My Kicker Comp R would not even respond.
customer_reviews.author: Roosevelt

customer_reviews.title: Barely powers 12" sub
customer_reviews.text: This amp could not power my Sony Xplod 12 inch sub. Received it today and returning it today.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Mull

customer_reviews.title: Amp Happy
customer_reviews.text: amp works good hooked up to 12 inch pioneer has enought power to push it fine have the amp down to 1/2 level not into alot of bass easy to hook up YES u need to hook up the remote wire to make amp work.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Item work great packing was not good had no tape on packing ...
customer_reviews.text: Item work great packing was not good had no tape on packing could of been stolen in replace with something else but item work great give it A+
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing! Purchased the Pioneer GM-A372 amp and the ...
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointing! Purchased the Pioneer GM-A372 amp and the Pioneer TS-SWX2502 sub but the amp doesn't operate. Amp will not power up, double check all connections and even ran a the remote wire to switch the amp on even though it has a feature to turn the amp on by sensing the signal to the rca connectors. Well let see how they take of this problem. Update to follow
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Really good amp for price
customer_reviews.text: Really good amp puts out a lots of power to my kenwood subwoofer which is a 12in
customer_reviews.author: Jay
